org.kepler.hadoop.util

Class DDPPatternActorUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.hadoop.util.DDPPatternActorUtil

  • public class DDPPatternActorUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class includes a datatype used in HadoopDirector. Its elements: 1) name; 2) workflow xml string; 3) data types of the inputs and outputs; 4) implementation class.
    Author:
    Jianwu Wang (jianwu@sdsc.edu)
